title: 🎃 PC Kids Halloween Scavenger Hunt

hints.text: Tonight, you may see witches, goblins, or ghouls. Or perhaps you‘ll find a friendly little ghost "chilling" where drinks are kept cool for your next clue.
Witches cackle and ghosts say "boo". I‘d check where mail is sorted for your next clue.
Werewolves howl looking for treats, find your next ghost where puppies like to eat.
Ding, dong, I hear someone at the door. Is it trick or treaters or maybe just a friendly ghost? Quick, run to the door and let in your ghost with your next clue
hints.answer: Counter by Lobby parking garage door

hints.text: Halloween is known for being a spooky night. Find your next clue where Witches fly high into the night sky. Up, up, and away you go to find your next ghost with a clue.
Hurry up, don‘t be late, your little ghost is getting cold. He‘s waiting next to something orange and round. It grows from a plant and sits on the ground.
Witches fly into the night, but zombies linger down below. Take a trip to the lower level where your ghost is hiding with your next clue.
To make a mummy costume, you‘ll need to use a toilet paper wrap. A ghost is waiting by a roll of this. I promise, it‘s not a trap! Quickly head back up to the common area, your ghost is waiting.
Can you watch a skeleton dance and do your own monster mash? This little ghost is getting tired and winding down for the night. Don‘t interrupt his favorite movie, Casper to find the final clue.

Will you be a ninja, superhero, zombie, or clown? Or maybe a princess wearing a crown? A Halloween costume can be hard to choose, but not a bedtime story. Find your last ghost where you choose your next book.
hints.answer: Children‘s bookshelf at back of clubroom

congratsMessage: Congratulations, you found all the ghosts and solved all the spooky clues!
prizeInstructions: Look in the toy bin for your Halloween surprise!
